title: [信息]Custom Server Messages——自定义服务器消息[1.7.2]
author: Honker_Mick
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 09:00 编辑 
自定义服务器消息功能1编辑加入和离开的消息
2编辑我说的说话颜色
3禁用消息
4编辑deathmessages 颜色代码

配置Plugin:Updates:trueMetrics:trueEvent:Join:Enable:trueMessage:'&6%Player &9joined the game!'Quit:Enable:trueMessage:'&6%Player &9left the game!'Whitelist:Enable:trueMessage:'&4Sorry. &6You are not on the Whitelist!'ServerFull:Enable:trueMessage:'&4Sorry. &6The Server is full, try again Later!'Server:Motd:Enable:trueMessages:-'&bA minecraft server'-'&4A minecraft server'-'&1A minecraft server'-'&7A minecraft server'-'&6A minecraft server'-'&aA minecraft server'-'&2A minecraft server'Command:Say:Enable:trueMessage:'&6[%Player] >>> &b%Message'Me:Enable:trueMessage:'&6* %Player &b%Message'Plugins:Enable:trueMessage:'&4You dont have Permissions to see the Plugins!'Version:Enable:trueMessage:'&4You dont have Permissions to see the Version!'Seed:Enable:trueMessage:'&4You dont have Permissions to see the Seed!'DeathMessages:Enable:trueMessages:Drowned:'&6%Player &9drowned'FallDamage:'&6%Player &9hit the ground too hard'Void:'&6%Player &9fell out of the world'Lava:'&6%Player &9tried to swim in lava'Fire:'&6%Player &9went up in flames'Explosion:'&6%Player &9blew up'Magic:'&6%Player &9was killed by magic'Suffocated:'&6%Player &9suffocated in a wall'Projectile:'&6%Player &9was pricked to death'Starved:'&6%Player &9starved to death'Withered:'&6%Player &9withered away'Died:'&6%Player &9died'Player:'&6%Killer &9killed &6%Killed &9with a %Item'Slain:Pigman:'&6%Player &9was slain by Zombie Pigman'Zombie:'&6%Player &9was slain by Zombie'Spider:'&6%Player &9was slain by Spider'Silverfish:'&6%Player &9was slain by Silverfish'Slime:'&6%Player &9was slain by Slime'Creeper:'&6%Player &9was blown up by Creeper'MagmaCube:'&6%Player &9was slain by Magma Cube'Enderman:'&6%Player &9was slain by Enderman'EnderDragon:'&6%Player &9was slain by EnderDragon'CaveSpider:'&6%Player &9was slain by CaveSpider'IronGolem:'&6%Player &9was slain by IronGolem'Wolf:'&6%Player &9was slain by Wolf'Giant:'&6%Player &9was slain by Giant'Wither:'&6%Player &9was slain by Wither'Skeleton:'&6%Player &9was shot by Skeleton'Blaze:'&6%Player &9was fireballed by Blaze'Ghast:'&6%Player &9was fireballed by Ghast'Witch:'&6%Player &9was slain by Witch'WitherSkeleton:'&6%Player &9was slain by WitherSkeleton'声明CustomServerMessages使用一个自动更新程序。这意味着将会自动下载新版本,默认情况下。你可以禁用这个选项在config.yml !

插件将使用统计信息发送给服务器http://mcstats.org/。你可以禁用config.yml !
